label: DAOstack - Decentralized Governance
tag line: An operating system for collective intelligence
Description1: DAOstack powers decentralized companies, funds and markets to make fast and innovative decisions at scale.
Description2: We enable decentralized budget and rewarding management for collectives by proposing and voting using Alchemy.  Arc allows decentralizing ownership of DApps.  Holographic Consensus powers collective decision making DApps, by incentivizing the collective attention.
Open feedback: Let me know if anything needs further clarification at: nave@daostack.io
Community Info: Multi-national, very diverse group of people: innovators, entrepreneurs, academics, social activists, policy makers, tech enthusiasts, investors, young and old, men and women.
description:
#An operating system for collective intelligence
##About DAOstack - Decentralized Governance
![About DAOstack - Decentralized Governance](https://www.youtube.com/embed/25wtmzBG1Yg?ecver=2)
 ### DAOstack powers decentralized companies, funds and markets to make fast and innovative decisions at scale.
We enable decentralized budget and rewarding management for collectives by proposing and voting using Alchemy.  Arc allows decentralizing ownership of DApps.  Holographic Consensus powers collective decision making DApps, by incentivizing the collective attention.
